input.sentences: today was first day at school camp
the instructor showed is how to make floats for the mini pools
we had a great time learning lots of new things
after crafts we went out to chase butterflies

output.sentences: It was day one of the outdoor classroom.
The instructors were showing the kids what to look for.
They had the chance to hold new creatures and learn about them.
Along with the chance to try to catch butterflies.
A very exciting day was had by them all.
